tool_description: Executes bulk inventory updates across multiple platforms simultaneously, handling API rate limits, retries, and transaction rollbacks for failed operations.

update_instructions.description: Array of update instructions from Priority Rule Engine

connection_ids.description: Platform connection IDs from Platform Connector

retry_attempts.description: Maximum retry attempts for failed updates

rollback_on_failure.description: Whether to rollback batch if any update fails

validate_before_update.description: Whether to validate data before sending updates

parallel_execution.description: Whether to execute updates in parallel across platforms

dry_run.description: Whether to simulate updates without actually applying them

error_messages: Empty update instructions: update_instructions array cannot be empty.
Platform connection mismatch: Number of target_platforms must match connection_ids.
Invalid connection ID: One or more connection_ids are invalid or expired.
Batch size too large: batch_size exceeds platform API limits.
Invalid retry configuration: retry_attempts must be 0-10, retry_delay_seconds must be 1-60.
Update validation failed: One or more updates failed pre-execution validation.
usage: Provide update_instructions from Priority Rule Engine, matching target_platforms with connection_ids. Configure batch_size and retry settings based on platform limits. Use dry_run for testing.

total_updates_attempted.description: Total number of update operations attempted

platform_results.description: Detailed results per platform in JSON format
